system.description:
Green, cunning, and perpetually vilified, Goblins thrive on the edge of chaos. For a Goblin, vanishing into the shadows is not just a skillâ€”it's an identity. After all, what kind of Goblin would you be if you couldn't slip away unnoticed?

Skedaddle

Can move 2 spaces for free after you become the target of an attack or negative effect (after damage, ignoring difficult terrain).

You know Goblin if your INT is not negative. [M]
